p: The FT-IR spectra of the Cordyceps NE, COR-Ex, and sea buckthorn oil are shown in Figure 1. The Cordyceps extract exhibited absorption bands at 3269, 2937, 2137, 1608, and 1407 cm −1, corresponding to –OH broad (phenolic OH), (C-H) stretching, and alkyne (C=O) stretch (amide bond) major functional groups, respectively.
